p: The three-dimensional coordinates of the targets of SARS-CoV-2 molecules 6LU7 (3CL pro), 7JRN (PLpro), 6M71 (RdRp), 6ZSL (helicase), 6W41 (spike protein), and 1R42 (ACE2) were retrieved from PDB [ [13], [14], [15], [16], [17]]. These SARS-CoV-2 target proteins have been used in several investigations to identify therapeutics against COVID-19 [ 13, [18], [19], [20], [21]]. The protein molecules were processed by removing crystallographic water molecules, adding polar hydrogens, followed by stabilizing the charges as demonstrated earlier [ 22, 23]. Finally, the three-dimensional coordinates were converted into PDBQT format using ADT [ 12].
